name: Every Woman Counts
description: Every Woman Counts provides free breast and cervical cancer screenings to uninsured and underinsured California women, helping detect cancer early when treatment is most effective.
fullDescription: Every Woman Counts provides free breast and cervical cancer screenings to uninsured and underinsured California women, helping detect cancer early when treatment is most effective.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free mammograms
- Clinical breast exams
- Pap tests (cervical cancer screening)
- HPV tests
- Follow-up diagnostic testing if needed
- Connection to treatment through BCCTP
- Available at hundreds of providers statewide
howToGetIt: Call 1-800-511-2300 to find a provider and check eligibility. You must be a California resident, age 21+, with income at or below 200% of the federal poverty level, and uninsured or underinsured for these services.
